mapper.insert: insert into BOARDMENU (BOARDMENU_SEQ, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_DELETE) VALUES (BOARDMENU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_name}, #{board_delete})
mapper.update: update Boardmenu set board_name=#{board_name}, board_delete =#{board_delete} where boardmenu_seq = #{boardmenu_seq}
mapper.select: select BOARDMENU_SEQ, LEVEL BOARDLEVEL, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_PARENT_SEQ, CASE WHEN LEVEL = 1 THEN '' ELSE LPAD(' ㄴ', LEVEL*4, ' ') END || CASE WHEN BOARD_DELETE = 'Y' THEN '**삭제된 글입니다.**' ELSE BOARD_TITLE END BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, BOARD_DELETE, CREATE_DATE FROM(select * from board where boardmenu_seq = #{boardmenu_seq} and board_delete ='N') START WITH BOARD_PARENT_SEQ is null CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_PARENT_SEQ ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_SEQ
